Interface ec.encoding.DecodeResult

public interface interface DecodeResult
This interface is the sort of object returned from a Decoder's decode() method. See Decoder for further details.

See Also:
Decoder

decodeBody(Object[])
Take the given body arguments and finish instantiating the object that this DecodeResult is all about.
getInstance()
Get instance that this DecodeResult is all about.

getInstance 
 public abstract Object getInstance()
Get instance that this DecodeResult is all about. If decodeBody() has not yet been called, then the instance is only guaranteed to be partially initialized--it's object identity won't change, but it won't necessarily respond sensibly to any methods.

Returns:
the instance
decodeBody 
 public abstract void decodeBody(Object bodyArgs[])
Take the given body arguments and finish instantiating the object that this DecodeResult is all about.

Parameters:
bodyArgs - the body arguments
